title: An Act relative to the Civilian Marksmanship Program

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Howitt of Seekonk, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2640) of Steven S. Howitt and David F. DeCoste relative to firearms furnished through the civilian marksmanship program.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
